landing.title: ATI PAYROLL MADE SIMPLE FOR CANADIAN SMALL BUSINESS
landing.description: Experience a smooth and stress-free payroll process with our easy-to-navigate platform. Automatically calculate CPP, EI, and income taxes, pay employees on time, and stay fully CRA compliant. Designed for small business owners who value simplicity, accuracy, and peace of mind—all in one place.
landing.employeePortalDesc: Access your pay stubs, T4 forms, and personal employment information anytime, anywhere.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything You Need for Canadian Payroll
landing.featuresDesc: Comprehensive features designed specifically for Canadian businesses
landing.multiCompanyDesc: Manage payroll for multiple companies from a single dashboard with ease.
landing.employeeDatabaseDesc: Comprehensive employee records with automatic CPP, EI, and tax calculations.
landing.automatedCalcDesc: Built-in Canadian payroll calculator with current CRA rates and tax brackets.
landing.craComplianceDesc: Stay compliant with automated remittance tracking and government reporting.
landing.detailedReportsDesc: Generate comprehensive payroll reports, year-end summaries, and analytics.
landing.timeSavingDesc: Process payroll in minutes with automated pay stub generation and distribution.
landing.onePrice: One comprehensive plan with all features included
landing.enterBothFields: Please enter both username and password
landing.heroDescription: Run payroll, calculate accurate deductions, generate pay stubs, ROEs, and T4s with 100% CRA compliance—all in minutes.
landing.securityDesc: Enterprise-grade security with 100% CRA compliance guarantee
landing.hostedInCanadaDesc: All data hosted securely in Canada
landing.planDescription: Complete Canadian payroll solution for your business
landing.feature4: Canadian tax calculations (CPP, EI, Federal, Provincial)
landing.feature5: Pay stub generation with PDF export

signup.title: Create Your Account
signup.subtitle: Start managing your payroll today
signup.signupDescription: Sign up to access all features
signup.securityNote: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to access your payroll dashboard
login.employeeQuestion: Are you an employee? Click here to login
login.securityNote: Your authentication is handled securely through Google's OAuth 2.0 system
login.accountCreated: Welcome! Your account has been created

auth.autoRedirect: You will be redirected automatically in a few seconds

signup_success.title: Welcome to ATI!
signup_success.description: Your account has been created successfully. You can now start managing your payroll.

signup_existing.title: Account Already Exists
signup_existing.description: It looks like you already have an account with this email. Please log in instead.
signup_existing.hint: Click the button above to go to the login page

login_created.title: Welcome! Account Created
login_created.description: We noticed this is your first time here. Your account has been created successfully!

login_success.title: Welcome Back!
login_success.description: You have successfully logged into your account.
